title: (x) The Return of The Scarlet Pimpernel - various {gang}
author: core

comments.content:
or americratika formerly known as democratika   
   
 [http://www.fonthead.com/fonts-vol4.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001302/http:/www.fonthead.com/fonts-vol4.html)

[Batarde Coulee](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001302/http:/www.lineto.com/cont_cat.html?ID=161&dir_id=60) from Lineto is a nice 1700s script based on Fournier's hand. Mark van Bronkhorst's [Chanson d'Amour](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001302/http:/www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm?cfid=343669&id=43430) may have been based on the same source. And in the same vein is [Schooner Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001302/http:/www.typequarry.com/type.html?sku=011) from Brian Willson.
Damn this forum's non-standard format coding!
